All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractSegmentParser
A SegmentParser parses segments of the specified type.
AbstractStructureParser
This is an abstract implementation for StructureParser instances used by the MessageParser.
AddressParser
AddressParser is a parser for addresses.
ContactPointParser
Parser that supports parsing a String, or HL7 Version into a FHIR ContactPoint.
Context
Context keeps track of important decision making variables during the parse of an HL7 message.
DatatypeConverter
DatatypeConverter is the entry point for V2 to FHIR datatype conversion.
DatatypeConverter.Converter<F extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type>
A functional interface for FHIR datatype conversion from HAPI V2 datatypes
DatatypeParser<T extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type>
A parser for a FHIR Datatype
ERRParser
Parser for an ERR segment.
HumanNameParser
Parser for Human Names.
Mapping
This utility class supports mapping between coded values and system names in V2 and FHIR
MessageParser
MessageParser provide the necessary methods to convert messages and segments into FHIR Bundles and Resources respectively.
MSAParser
Parse an MSA segment into MessageHeader and OperationOutcome resources.
MSHParser
The MSH Parser creates a MessageHeader Resource for MSH segements.
ParserUtils
ParserUtils is a utility class supporting Parsing of V2 messages into FHIR
PathUtils
This utility class contains methods for manipulating and converting between HAPI V2 Terser and FhirPath paths (as applied over V2 models).
QAKParser
Parser for QAK Segments The QAK segment populates OperationOutcome.issue referenced by any generated MessageHeader.response.details with the code from QAK-2 field.
QPDParser
The QPD Parser generates a Parameters resource documenting the QPD parameters found in QPD-3 to QPD-* For queries (message type of QBP): The Bundle.entry containing this Parameters resource in Bundle.entry.resource will contain a Bundle.entry.request element with the method set to GET and the url set to the FHIR _search URL which would perform the query.
StructureParser
This is the base interface for parsers of HL7 Structures (segments and groups).
Systems
Utility class containing OIDs, URIs and names for various coding and identifier systems
TextUtils
Utility class to convert FHIR and V2 Objects to and from strings used in text.
Units
Utility class for parsing and converting V2 ANSI, ISO+ or UCUM unit codes
